name: WebGLRenderingContext.getAttribLocation
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.getAttribLocation() method of the WebGL API returns the location of an attribute variable in a given WebGLProgram.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'getAttribLocation' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.
